meanings.definition: The act of placing items on shelves for storage.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy organizing my books on the shelving in my room.
meanings.sent2: The store bought new shelving to display their products.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a cozy spot on the shelving among the books.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a well-organized shelving unit, each thought neatly placed.
meanings.sent5: The bright red shelving stood out in the room, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A set of shelves used for storage.
meanings.sent1: The garage needed more shelving to store all the tools.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new set of shelving for her bedroom to keep her belongings organized.
meanings.sent3: The wobbly shelving in the kitchen made cooking an adventure.
meanings.sent4: The old wooden shelving creaked under the weight of the books.
meanings.sent5: The metal shelving gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing the items placed on it.

meanings.definition: The practice of postponing or suspending something.
meanings.sent1: His shelving of the project led to delays in its completion.
meanings.sent2: The shelving of the meeting disappointed many employees.
meanings.sent3: The shelving of dessert until after dinner made the kids anxious.
meanings.sent4: The shelving of the decision left everyone in uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The shelving of the event caused a ripple effect in the community.
